returns._0: Returns total active shares across the vault
Returns active shares for an account
Returns claimable shares for an account
bool Returns true whether depositor is allowed under current Merkle root and flag settings
Returns total shares (active + claimable) for an account
Total shares including active and claimable
address Returns address of the vault using this ShareManager
bytes32 Returns Merkle root used for deposit whitelist verification

allocateShares(uint256).notice: Allocates `shares` that can be later minted via `mintAllocatedShares`

claimShares(address).notice: Triggers share claiming from queue to user

initialize(bytes).notice: Initializes the factory-created entity with arbitrary initialization data.

mint(address,uint256).notice: Mints new shares to a user directly

mintAllocatedShares(address,uint256).notice: Mints shares from the allocated pool

setAccountInfo(address,(bool,bool,bool,u.notice: Sets permissions and flags for a specific account

setFlags((bool,bool,bool,bool,bool,uint3.notice: Sets global flag bitmask controlling mints, burns, lockups, etc.

updateChecks(address,address).notice: Internal checks for mint/burn/transfer under flags, lockups, blacklists, etc.
